name: Sarah Simulator
description:
Sarah Simulator by aaron.#0007

> - 20 unique levels with different art and mechanics

> - Game runs smoothly

> - Engine Rendering with GUI

> - Ensures the integrity of your gaming experience (i.e. no FPS Drops/Crashes)

> - Supports both Intel & AMD

> - Unique builds for each request

> - Insane security method through EFI

> - Server sided updates (i.e. new loader each updated is not required)

> - Winvers 1803 and up

> - Windows XP, 7, 8 , 10, 11 compatible

--------------------------------------------------------

Why did we build this game? Ask @antt#3441

Why did we name the game this? Ask @RJ.#3934 

If you have any concerns, please add @aaron.#0007

--------------------------------------------------------

NOTE:  Sarah Simulator is still at its beta stage, major fixes and revamping will soon be made. Bugs are bound to happen, if you have any concerns regarding Crashes or Data Loss, please forward to the next sentence.

Thank you for your cooperation.

---------------------

Happy Grinding!
